title.narrative: Promotion of Sustainable Energy Practices in the Garment Sector in Cambodia

description.narrative: While we are still waiting for the 2018 SWITCH call for proposals to be issued, we have started brainstorming with GERES, goverment counterparts, H&M and other industry players on an update of the 2017 proposal that would address: 1) Policy measures to promote energy efficiency in the garment sector. This could include energy performance standards energy management protocols data acquisition (smart metering, audits, MRV) 2) design of a financial instrument 3) awareness and demand stimulation
